dialog: It really does. I wish more people were like that in this world. We need more people like you.
Thank you, I try to be the best person I can be. I just want everyone to be happy.
That's a great attitude to have. I'm sure you'll be a great person someday.
Thank you so much, that means a lot to me. I hope you have a great day!
You're welcome. I wish you the best of luck in your future endeavors.
Thank you very much, I appreciate it. I am sure you are a wonderful person as well.
